column2: I still remember a little bit from when the trouble started and I got turned into a vampire.
I think this might sound a little creepy, but it...actually felt kind of good.
If those machines come for me, will they make me like them? I wonder how [f2]that[/f] would feel.
Hey, you like my vampire outfit? Pretty cool, huh?
After all I’ve been through, the human life is definitely for me. But it’s fun to role-play a little too!
